title: Calories in 1 Slice of Bacon
meta_description: Discover calories in 1 slice of bacon, including fat, protein, sodium, and full nutrition breakdown per slice with quick tweaks and FAQs.
assumptions: Pan-fried, regular-cut pork bacon slice (~8-10 g cooked weight); no added seasonings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, cut thickness, cooking method, and fat drainage. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One slice of cooked bacon provides ~43 kcal, mainly from fat, with 3 g protein.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in 1 slice of cooked bacon?
faqs.a: Approximately 43 kcal for a standard pan-fried slice.
Yes, one slice has ~192 mg sodium, about 8% of daily value.
